globalImprovements.recommendation: Design cohesive empty state illustrations across all screens
globalImprovements.promptText: Create friendly, encouraging illustrations for empty states that guide users toward taking action. Use consistent illustration style across home, calendar, and analytics screens.

globalImprovements.recommendation: Implement consistent inline validation feedback across all forms
globalImprovements.promptText: Add inline validation hints and helper text to forms. Show clear feedback when fields are required or have errors. Use subtle animations to draw attention to validation messages.

globalImprovements.recommendation: Establish clearer visual hierarchy with consistent spacing and typography
globalImprovements.promptText: Use consistent spacing scale (8px base), clear heading hierarchy, and deliberate white space to establish visual rhythm. Primary actions should be visually dominant.

globalImprovements.recommendation: Add clear hover/pressed states to all interactive elements
globalImprovements.promptText: Implement subtle background highlights and scale transforms on interactive elements to indicate tappability. Use consistent press feedback across all buttons, cards, and list items.

prioritizedImprovements.recommendation: Redesign task creation drawer with better validation and feedback
prioritizedImprovements.promptText: Task creation drawer improvements: 1) Add inline validation showing task name is required with subtle helper text, 2) Use human-friendly date format (Today, Tomorrow, Jan 11), 3) Use intuitive priority colors (green→yellow→red gradient), 4) Show character count or limit for task name

prioritizedImprovements.recommendation: Show meaningful empty state in analytics chart
prioritizedImprovements.promptText: When no activity data exists: 1) Show ghost/placeholder bars at 0 height with subtle fill, 2) Add encouraging message like 'Complete tasks to see your activity', 3) Include a CTA button to add first task

prioritizedImprovements.recommendation: Make home screen more engaging with better empty states and progress visualization
prioritizedImprovements.promptText: Home screen improvements: 1) Add visible track behind progress ring to show potential, 2) Use friendly illustration for empty task state, 3) Add motivational micro-copy, 4) Consider onboarding hints for new users

prioritizedImprovements.recommendation: Improve profile screen visual hierarchy and action styling
prioritizedImprovements.promptText: Profile improvements: 1) Use neutral color for Sign Out (not red), 2) Add subtle backgrounds to settings rows for tap affordance, 3) Use generic user icon for guest avatar, 4) Position upgrade CTA to not compete with settings

prioritizedImprovements.recommendation: Add quick navigation features to calendar
prioritizedImprovements.promptText: Calendar improvements: 1) Add 'Today' button for quick navigation, 2) Use more engaging empty state illustration, 3) Consider showing selected date context in header

prioritizedImprovements.recommendation: Polish login screen with better contrast and affordances
prioritizedImprovements.promptText: Login polish: 1) Increase contrast for Continue as Guest button, 2) Add password visibility toggle, 3) Consider full-width primary CTA for larger touch target
